title: Replace empty-string SelectItem values with sentinel for optional shadcn Select fields

requirements.summary: Eliminate all shadcn-ui SelectItem empty-string values by introducing a non-empty "None" sentinel while keeping empty-string Select values for placeholder/clearing behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: No <SelectItem> in the app uses an empty string value prop.
Optional selects still provide a visible "None" option that clears the selection (internally sets Select value to "") so the placeholder is shown.
The runtime warning/error about empty-string SelectItem values no longer appears in the browser console.

file_operations.description: Create a shared optional-select helper for shadcn-ui Select usage: export a non-empty NONE_SENTINEL (e.g., "__none__") and small mapping helpers to translate between the sentinel (used in SelectItem values) and the empty string (used in component state to clear and show placeholder). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update the optional Job select to remove <SelectItem value=""> and replace it with the shared NONE_SENTINEL. Map selecting the sentinel to setting form state jobOpeningId to "" so the Select shows the placeholder. Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui. Uses shadcn-ui Select components; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Update each specified form page to use a sentinel "None" option and map it to empty-string state so submissions still send null for optional backend fields.
acceptanceCriteria: In each listed page, selecting "None" results in the relevant state field being set to "" (empty string).
Submitting each form with "None" selected continues to send null for the corresponding optional backend field (e.g., jobOpeningId/clientId/jobOpeningId).
Selecting a real entity value still sets the state field to that entity id string and submits correctly.
